name: High Priestess
description: A holy warrior blessed by the Light, capable of healing allies and smiting enemies with divine power.

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heals a friendly unit for a large amount of health.

abilities.name: Divine Shield
abilities.description: Grants invulnerability to a friendly unit for a short duration.

abilities.name: Holy Nova
abilities.description: Releases a burst of holy energy, healing allies and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: Ultimate: Resurrects nearby fallen friendly units.
